resources.string:
"Moodle Centros is a service provided by the education department (Consejería de Desarrollo Educativo) of Junta de Andalucía.

I am not affiliated with Junta de Andalucía. Junta de Andalucía is not responsible for any issues that may occur while using this client.

As a developer, I support open source software. The source code is available at https://github.com/imhexp/moodleand

I do not make any revenue from this. It is just a labour of love for education, I'm not interested on any of your personal data nor do I sell it."
